comments.author: virgil.dicu@softvision.ro
comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111208 Firefox/11.0a1

STR:
1. Erase or modify the Firefox folder.
2. Start Firefox.
3. Import from Chrome.

Actual result: favicons of bookmark and history pages are displayed with default favicon unless loading the respective pages.

Favicons are loaded correctly when importing in Chrome from Firefox.
comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111208 Firefox/11.0a1

STR:
1. Erase or modify the Firefox folder.
2. Start Firefox.
3. Import from Chrome.

Actual result: favicons of bookmark and history pages are displayed with default favicon unless loading the respective pages.

Favicons are loaded correctly when importing in Chrome from Firefox.
